name: Information Technology
description:
The fusion of digital communication, network technologies and software methodologies necessitates new skills and theoretical background. Consequently, a large number of trained professionals are required to meet the growing job market in the Information Technology sector. So, a new academic programme started at Jadavpur University in 2000. The programme became a full-fledged department in 2001.

The undergraduate program is NBA accredited for the academic years 2023 – 2024 to 2025 – 2026 (up to 30.06.2026)
